P

PermissionAdvisor<T> - Interface in com.agorapulse.permissions
The permission advisor checks the permissions for the given object and the current execution context.
PermissionChecker - Interface in com.agorapulse.permissions
PermissionChecker is the service backing the RequiresPermission annotation and can be used for low-level access.
PermissionCheckResult - Enum in com.agorapulse.permissions
The result of the permission check.
PermissionException - Exception in com.agorapulse.permissions
The exception is throw when there are missing permissions for a particular value.
PermissionException(String, Object) - Constructor for exception com.agorapulse.permissions.PermissionException
